    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_113782</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Charged particle tracks in a bubble chamber</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Belastete Partikelspuren in einem Luftblase Raum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pistes chargées de particules dans une chambre de
bulle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trilhas carregadas da partícula em uma câmara de
bolha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Piste caricate della particella in un 
alloggiamento di bolla</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρεωμένες διαδρομές μορίων σε μια αίθουσα φυσαλίδων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pistas cargadas de la partícula en un 
compartimiento de burbuja</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration compares the different paths of different charged particles produced when a pion interacts with a proton in a bubble chamber.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bubble chamber</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">charged particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conservation of momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kaons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Protons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tracks</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung vergleicht die unterschiedlichen 
Pfade der unterschiedlichen belasteten produzierten Partikel, wenn ein
Pion auf ein Proton in einem Luftblase Raum einwirkt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration compare les différentes voies 
d'accès de différentes particules chargées produites quand un 
méson pi agit l'un sur l'autre avec un proton dans une chambre de 
bulle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração compara os trajetos diferentes 
das partículas carregadas diferentes produzidas quando um pion 
interage com um proton em uma câmara de bolha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione confronta i percorsi 
differenti delle particelle caricate differenti prodotte quando un 
pion si interagisce con un protone in un alloggiamento di bolla.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση συγκρίνει τα διαφορετικά μονοπάτια 
των διαφορετικών χρεωμένων μορίων παραχθέντων όταν αλληλεπιδρά 
pion με ένα πρωτόνιο σε μια αίθουσα φυσαλίδων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración compara los diversos caminos de
diversas partículas cargadas producidas cuando un pion obra 
recíprocamente con un protón en un compartimiento de burbuja.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Luftblase Raum</string>
          </keyword>
